result.title: Find 2 shortest paths between 2 vertices
result.content:
You are given a undirected weighted graph with at most 50000 vertices, 100000 edges and 2 vertices A and B. You have to find 2 paths from A to B that no edge is used twice (but they can have common vertices), and the sum of the length of these 2 paths is minimal.

I'm currently stuck on this problem. Can anyone give me a hint? Thank you.
